{"__typename":"RiskHazardsWithMethod","methodDescription":"Standard Procedure for Line Cooldown","hazards":[{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Tank pressure high","existingMeasures":"1. PTW & Check lists
2. Tool Box meeting
3. Continuous monitoring of tank pressure using trending graph.
4. Maintain the tank pressure by gas burning or by GCU","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":4,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":4,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Incorrect/Rapid operation","existingMeasures":"1. Procedures to be followed as mentioned in the cargo operation manual
2. Rate of supply of vapor should be controlled and monitored continuously
3.Gas sampling should be done regularly and verified whether it is matching as per the procedures
4. Experienced person should supervise at regular intervals","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":4,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":4,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Electrostatic energy","existingMeasures":"1. PTW and check lists are complied with
2. Static charge discharged prior going to deck
3. Bonding strips are used on the flange joints and stay wires
4. Training of personnel","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":4,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":4,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Cryogenic hazard - liquid leak for the pressurerised line","existingMeasures":"1. Procedures to be followed as mentioned in the cargo operation manual
2. Rate of supply of vapor should be controlled and monitored continuously
3.Gas sampling should be done regularly and verified whether it is matching as per the procedures
4. Experienced person should supervise at regular intervals","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":2,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":1,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Incorrect calibration of test equipment","existingMeasures":"1. Check and calibrate the equipments prior using
2. Calibrate the test equipments on regular basis as per manufacturers instructions
3. Experienced personal to carry out the calibration","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Weather/Lightning","existingMeasures":"1. Continuous monitoring of weather
2. Stop work policy
3. OOW should alert the personnel involved in task if any change in wind direction, Lightning and weather changes
4. Competency of personnel","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":4,"consequence":2,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":3,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":2,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"In-experience","existingMeasures":"1. Train the juniors/new joined personnel
2. Tool box meeting and briefing prior commencing the task
3. Trainees/freshers should repeat the command when given over the walkie talkie and confirm
4. Proper PPE should be used","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":1,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":1,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Poor maintenance","existingMeasures":"1. Follow checklists and procedures as mentioned in the instructions
2. Check the condition of the valves and equipments prior commencing
3. Experienced personnel should train the inexperienced and supervise them","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":2,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":1,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Cold Surface","existingMeasures":"1. Use proper PPE's
2.Training of personnel
3.Supervision by responsible person","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Poor communication","existingMeasures":"1. PTW & Check lists to be complied with
2. Approved type radios to be used and the channel to be agreed
3. Test the communication channel and confirm prior commencing the task
","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":2,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":1,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Work Planning","existingMeasures":"1. 3. Work rest hour to be monitored strictly
4. Personnel to be assigned on rotational basis
5. Training/Briefing to personnel","additionalMeasures":null,"likelihood":3,"consequence":3,"likelihoodAfterExistingMeasures":2,"consequenceAfterExistingMeasures":3,"likelihoodAfterAdditionalMeasures":null,"consequenceAfterAdditionalMeasures":null},{"__typename":"RiskHazard","identifiedHazard":"Forcing/Masking/Inhibit","existingMeasures":"1. 2. Identify barrier over ridden
3. Written procedure for execuation and recovery.
4. RA to identify forcing is overiding safety and necessary precaution.
